review: My complaint for this item, is there is NO technical support. I could not get shows to stream to my TV. I followed all the troubleshooting steps, and still cannot get it to work. There is no support number to call, so i am returning the Amazon Fire. What a pain.

review: I can choose the shows & movies I want to watch.

review: I added this Fire TV in my garage. I had a small 26" tried to give it away twice and finally found a logical purpose for it in my garage. The packaging rivals Apple for the slick presentation out of box. Fire has form and function. Intuitive navigation, nice content selection. I really like the Bloomberg channel and the Tune  In radio.  Nice job!
